sentences.sContent: His favourite opening gambit is: "You are so beautiful, will you be my next wife?"
sentences.sCn: 他最喜欢的开场白是：“你真漂亮。愿意做我的下一任妻子吗？”

sentences.sContent: Bernard made no response to Tom's conversational gambits.
sentences.sCn: 伯纳德没有回应汤姆对话的开场白。

synos.tran: 话题；开始；以取得优势的开局棋法；开场白

trans.tranCn: 话题；开始；以取得优势的开局棋法；开场白
trans.tranOther: A gambit is a remark which you make to someone in order to start or continue a conversation with them
